info.name: Shaheen Insurance - Admin APIs (Phase 0-3)
info.description: Admin Auth + Session + RBAC + Unified Proposals Inbox (Phase 1) + Proposal Details & Review Actions (Phase 2) + Refunds Workflow (Phase 3)

formdata.value: Got it. Please share payment proof or transaction ID.

item.name: Motor Detail (Docs + Images)
item.description: Returns motor proposal details with motor_documents and motor_vehicle_images, plus *_url fields.

item.name: Travel Detail (by subtype) + Docs
item.description: Returns travel proposal details with destinations and family members (where applicable), plus lifecycle/review fields.

body.raw:
{
  "action": "reupload_required",
  "reupload_notes": "CNIC images are blurry. Upload clear front/back.",
  "required_docs": [
    { "doc_type": "CNIC", "side": "front" },
    { "doc_type": "CNIC", "side": "back" },
    { "image_type": "back_side" }  ]
}

item.name: Issue Policy (MOTOR) + Upload Schedule
item.description: Uploads policy schedule (PDF/JPG/PNG) and issues a Motor policy. Policy start date uses insurance_start_date from proposal and expires after 1 year. Admin manually enters policy_no.

item.name: Issue Policy (TRAVEL) + Upload Schedule
item.description: Uploads policy schedule (PDF/JPG/PNG) and issues a Travel policy. Policy tenure uses proposal start_date and end_date. travelPackageCode is required for TRAVEL (DOMESTIC / HAJJ_UMRAH_ZIARAT / INTERNATIONAL / STUDENT_GUARD). Admin manually enters policy_no.

item.name: Send Renewal Document (MOTOR) - Upload PDF/JPG/PNG

formdata.value: Renewal document for expired motor policy

item.description: Uploads renewal document (PDF/JPG/PNG) for an expired Motor policy. Allowed only if policy_status=expired OR policy_expires_at < CURDATE().

item.name: Refunds Inbox (Initiated)
item.description: Finance view: list proposals with refund_status=refund_initiated (MOTOR + TRAVEL).

item.name: Motor Refund Detail
item.description: Get motor proposal refund fields + refund_evidence_url.

item.name: Travel Refund Detail
item.description: Get travel proposal refund fields + refund_evidence_url.

item.name: Motor Refund Update
item.description: Allowed transitions: refund_initiated -> refund_processed -> closed.

item.name: Motor Refund Evidence Upload (multipart)
item.description: Upload refund evidence file. Field name: evidence. Set collection var refundEvidenceFile to an absolute path on your machine.

item.name: Travel Refund Evidence Upload (multipart)
item.description: Upload refund evidence file. Field name: evidence. Set collection var refundEvidenceFile to an absolute path on your machine.

item.name: Claims Inbox (Motor) - list
item.description: Admin inbox listing all Motor claims (FNOL).

item.name: Claim Detail (Motor) by Claim ID
item.description: Admin view of a Motor claim including FNOL ref and evidence urls.

item.name: Review Claim (Motor) - Approve
item.description: Approve a claim (sets review_status=approved).

item.name: Review Claim (Motor) - Reject
item.description: Reject a claim (sets review_status=rejected + reason).

item.name: Review Claim (Motor) - Reupload Required
item.description: Marks claim as reupload_required and sets required_docs for user reupload flow (Phase-2 style).

item.name: List Users
item.description: Read-only paginated user list. Accessible by SUPPORT_ADMIN / OPERATIONS_ADMIN.

item.name: Get User Detail
item.description: Returns full user profile (no password fields).

item.name: List All Proposals of User by User ID
item.description: Returns all Proposals of User by User ID

item.name: Trigger Password Reset (Send OTP)
item.description: Triggers OTP email using existing otp.service.js + mailer.js
